snippet: DANOFF--Neil, born May 1, 1947 passed away peacefully on March 5, 2016. Services are being handled by Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10028. Please visit Neil's Memorial Web Page to read his full obituary and to sign his online guest book at: www.frankecampbell.com 1/3
